default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: It's not the first time I've been locked up in a place of this sort... Come on, show me how you're going to torture me this time! What kind of crime did those maggots assign to me again?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: The price has been paid. This is the power I deserve.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: It's time. I must fulfill my promise.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: Operation ON. Everybody stay alert.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: Enemy targets cleared. Operation still on. Stay on your guard.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Haha... In the end, I've been able to protect nothing and no one...

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Don't dream of getting past me!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: I've... let you down...

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Corruptors, thugs and conspirators are still rampaging through the city... You should act now.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: Maggots have infested this city, pulling strings to manipulate everyone. I want them dead.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: Never underestimate the darkness lurking beneath this city. That's a lesson that's cost me everything.

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: I should have died on the streets like other Syndicans, but Abel took me from that place. Looking back now, it might have been a mistake...

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: It's been eight years, and nothing has changed in the DisCity. Abel, together with his dream, has completely disappeared from people's memories. Sometimes I wonder, what do they actually remember?

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Murdering your own... father, your long-time subordinates, burying everything you cherish... You want to know what that feels like? Haha, you won't like it.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Fighting alongside you might be the only sensible choice I've made in my whole life.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: Those whom I could call my friends are all gone now. Try to... stay alive a bit longer. Don't die in front of me.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Abel, Vera... I won't let you down... not again...

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Tungsten carbide armors are indeed very useful. If you like it, you should get one for yourself too.

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Are you monitoring me? Or... do you need someone to keep you safe?

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: Mission received. Drawing up an operation plan now.

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: Mission accomplished. After-action report submitted.

default.title: Level Up
default.text: I can endure more.

default.title: Deploy
default.text: I won't let them lay a hand on you.

default.title: Pat Head
default.text: I... dislike that.

under_the_neon_lights.title: Obtain Attire
under_the_neon_lights.text: How much longer do we still need to stay here? "We need to wait for a reply?" Sigh, alright... in case of an emergency, you can order me to do anything.

under_the_neon_lights.title: Greeting
under_the_neon_lights.text: Time to act. It's easy to lose yourself in this kind of fun. I don't want you to get addicted.

under_the_neon_lights.title: Ordinary Contact 1
under_the_neon_lights.text: "The dirtiest places hold the most precious intelligence". I agree with you on this point. But... I still need some time to get used to these blinding neon lights.

under_the_neon_lights.title: Ordinary Contact 2
under_the_neon_lights.text: Fight side by side? In such a tiny space, it's best that I handle anything that might happen.

under_the_neon_lights.title: Idle
under_the_neon_lights.text: ...Stay away, I'm waiting for my... companion to come back.

under_the_neon_lights.title: Annoyed
under_the_neon_lights.text: ...We're still on a mission. No time for these distractions.

under_the_neon_lights.title: Level Up
under_the_neon_lights.text: I don't need to stand out.

under_the_neon_lights.title: Special Attention
under_the_neon_lights.text: I'll keep you safe and sound so you can complete the mission. I hope you muster enough courage and don't waste too much time.
